root: ^Banging on the door interrupts everyone’s train of thought.
^I got the equipment set up in the van, but I need to bring some infrareds and thermometers. I’ve already called for help from the firm. They should be here soon.
^Sounds good, We’re going to start setting up here.
^Girish hands you the spirit box and 2 packets of salt.
^Your time to shine, use it when you think necessary and alert us if you see anything unusual.
^Girish hands you a notepad with writing on it. Notepad shows on screen.
^This is a list of things that we’re here to do, get these done and bring the materials back to me. I trust that you can get the job done and we can all get out of here, alive.

root.#: gameplay scene where Jorge finds Don’s body

root: ^You see the shoe outside the bathroom and enter
^Don's corpse is lodged into the corner, head nearly backwards. You feel pale and cold.

Use: ^The spirit box presents a high amount of feedback and hurts your ears.
Continue: ^You walk out of the bathroom and make your way to Girish to inform him.
^We’re dealing with a violent being, something angry with our presence.
^Girish seems stressed out for a second before going back to his curious pose.
^We’re trapped in here with that spirit and we need to exorcise it fast. Find the materials, I’m still setting up here.
